head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LIPPINCOTT, ELEANOR HALLOWELL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LIPPINCOTT, ELEANOR HALLOWELL

block.p: LIPPINCOTT-Eleanor Hallowell. Died October, 15, 2000, Princeton, New Jersey. Mother of John Willard Lapsley, Marian Lapsley Schwarz, Nina Lapsley Alexander, Katherine Boucher Beug, and sister of Phillips Hallowell. In lieu of flowers, please send contributions to Channel Thirteen. Memorial Service at Princeton Unitarian Church, Cherry Hill Road, 11 A.M. Saturday, October 20, 2000.
